question: Do I have to enter/type a voucher code on checkout to get a bank discount?
answer: No, payment vouchers are collectible vouchers and no code has to be entered/typed on checkout to avail the bank discount. You have to simply collect the respective voucher to become eligible for the discount.After collection, head towards order placement, enter the card details on the payment page and the discount will get applied automatically.

question: What promotions are included in Buy More, Save More?
answer: Buy More, Save More offers promotions such as free delivery and product discount based on how much you spend. The more you spend, the greater the promotions you unlock! Refer below for more information.

question: What is the validity of vouchers?
answer: You can check the validity of the Voucher under the Voucher detail.

question: Can I avail payment voucher which I collected on a respective bank day after the bank day has passed?
answer: No. A payment voucher should be redeemed on the transaction on a specified bank discount day only. The voucher will get expired if you do not use it on the mentioned date.

question: Will my gems expire if I'm a Daraz Club member?
answer: Your gems will expire in 6 months from the date they have been collected.For example, you collect your coins on 1st January 2025. Their expiry will be on 30th June 2025.

question: What is the exchange rate of Gems?
answer: Daraz Gems can be redeemed to avail discount while placing an order. You can exchange gems on the checkout page to get a discount on your purchase on the application only.1% - 5% Max Discount of Rs.2815% - 20% Max Discount of Rs.140

question: What is Daraz gems and how can I earn it?
answer: Daraz Gems is an engagement tool, a mechanic through which you can earn rewards (gems) for being a loyal customer on Daraz.Gems earned can be redeemed to gain discounts on your next purchases.You can earn GEMS by purchasing selected products on Daraz. Place an order for any item and once your order gets marked as delivered, earn the allocated amount of Gems.Please note that Daraz Gems can be accessed through the Daraz App only.

question: How can I earn Gems?
answer: There are 4 ways to collect gems:Daily check-inComplete Daily Mission (Tap Earn more on top of the page after check in and Browse Gems page for 10s)Post Purchase (After purchasing a product, there will be a banner pop up showing how to get a certain amount of gems to redeem)Daraz Candy Games (after playing games, you will get coins)Please note that Daraz Gems can be accessed through Daraz App only.

question: What is Easy Monthly Installments (EMI)?
answer: Daraz EMI is a service that allows you to purchase certain items through a monthly instalment payment plan using your credit card (with selected banks). The blocked amount will also be visible on your monthly statement as well. How can I avail EMI on my Daraz purchase? question: How do I track my complaint about delivery?
answer: We apologize for the inconvenience that caused you to register a complaint at Daraz. It takes 3 working days to respond to the complaint. If you have not heard back from our Complaint Resolution team, please contact us on Live Chat.The complaint management team will be happy to assist you.

question: Why are my items shipped separately?
answer: In order to make sure that there is no delay in the fulfillment of your order, we tend to deliver the items processed and shipped first to our Daraz centers.The major reasons for different shipment times of items are due to the fact that:The items in your order may be sourced from different sellers and since their location differs, the processing time may vary for each.The items in your order may exceed the standard limit in a single packaging, therefore, will need to split into several parcels

question: Which products take longer shipping time?
answer: Global / Overseas products are internationally sourced products and take 25-30 flat days to be delivered to your doorstep. To know more about the Global Collection range at Daraz, please visit Global Collection.

question: I have a complaint about the courier executive who came to deliver my order, who should I reach out?

question: I ordered multiple items but I have received only one item so far. What needs to be done?
answer: Items sourced from different sellers are often shipped separately to make sure that there is no delay in the fulfilment of your order. Rest assured that you will get all your items within the delivery period mentioned on the product pages of those items. There are no hidden charges on partial shipment.However, you may also track your order through DarazApp > My Account > Order Details.

question: I missed my package delivery, what should I do now?
answer: If you missed the delivery, we’d attempt to deliver your order again. The rider may contact you to confirm your availability or location.We will attempt the delivery of your order 3 times before cancelling it.

question: How should I pack the items for return?
answer: Except for Groceries items, all physical items should be packed as per following:Fashion products: Unworn and unwashed, can be tried on for fit.Include all received items: free gifts, warranties, tags, manuals.Return in undamaged original packaging, no tape on manufacturer's box.Protect damaged Daraz packaging with extra plastic wrapping.Maintain product's received conditionChoose drop-off or pickup for the return process.Important: Pack items separately by their unique return tracking numbers.
